name: Tag Change
text:
The following effects can be used once per Duel while your Life Points are at 3000 or below:
● Return 1 "Gouki" monster or "Dinowrestler" monster you control to the hand. Play 1 "Gouki" monster or 1 "Dinowrestler" monster with an original Level less than or equal to the monster that was returned to the hand.
● Send 1 "Gouki" monster or 1 "Dinowrestler" monster to the Graveyard from your hand. Then, play 1 "Desperate Tag" face-up to your field from outside of the Deck. This Skill can only be used if you begin the Duel with a Deck/Extra Deck that contains at least 1 monster, and no monsters other than "Gouki" or "Dinowrestler" monsters.
